← Home About Publications

Oscar Rodríguez Rocha

I'm a researcher interested in the Semantic Web, Linked Data, Knowledge Engineering, eEducation and Context-Aware Mobile Computing


My list of publications

This list was taken in September 2016 from DBLP. Please consider that some publications may be missing because they have not yet been indexed.

  • Journals
  • C. Figueroa, I. Vagliano, O. R. Rocha, and M. Morisio, “A systematic literature review of Linked Data-based recommender systems,” Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience, vol. 27, no. 17, pp. 4659–4684, 2015 [Online]. Available at: http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/cpe.3449
